pullRequest.body:
* `Data.EReal.Basic` contains mostly coercion properties.
* `Data.EReal.Order` contains properties of `add neg mul sub`. (The name is inspired by `Data.ENNReal.Order` which deals with the same operations on `ENNReal`).
* `Data.EReal.Inv` contains properties of `abs sign inv div`. (Inspired by `Data.ENNReal.Inv`.)

|-:|:-:|:-|
|14|-1|large files|

Current commit [88a6ad3a13](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/88a6ad3a1313c519e361e38ec9895e097940b231)
Reference commit [b4e2ffb295](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/b4e2ffb295eb3110e852499f3318c9ffc0d0271d)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

pullRequest.title: chore: split `Data.EReal.Basic`

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! 🐙
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```

Current commit [88a6ad3a13](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/88a6ad3a1313c519e361e38ec9895e097940b231)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
